r.s: PHP client library to communicate with the MogileFS storage
r.d: PHP MogileFS is a client library to communicate with MogileFS trackers. Those trackers are part of the distributed filesystem MogileFS created by Danga Interactive (http://www.danga.com/) and used in serveral large scale projects like LiveJournal.
r.n: - Added config.m4 to package.xml to allow installation via pecl/pear
